faq.title: Domande frequenti
faq.subtitle: Still Have Questions?
faq.description: We are ready to answer your questions. Contact us via email, chat, or phone call.

q1.question: What is the project delivery time?
q1.answer: Delivery time depends on the type and complexity of the project. Basic projects take 7-10 business days, professional projects take 15-21 business days, and enterprise projects take 30-45 business days.

q2.question: Is support provided after project delivery?
q2.answer: Yes, all plans include free support. Basic plan includes 3 months, professional plan includes 6 months, and enterprise plan includes 12 months of free support.

q3.question: Can I request changes to the project?
q3.answer: Yes, during the development process you can request changes and modifications as needed. These changes will be implemented based on your selected plan.

q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
q4.answer: We accept various payment methods. You can contact us via WhatsApp to discuss payment details.
